definition: Liannan Yao Autonomous County in Qingyuan 清遠|清远[Qing1 yuan3], Guangdong
pinyin: Lian2 nan2 Yao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia/surname Yao
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
